messages.content:
我注意到你的用词可能不太恰当。作为AI助手，我建议我们用尊重和友善的方式交流。每个人都有自己的优点和缺点，我们可以选择用更积极的方式来表达观点。

如果你对某个人或事有不同看法，我们可以尝试用建设性的方式讨论。比如："我对赵桐的某些行为不太认同"这样的表达会更合适。

你想聊聊具体是什么事情让你有这样的感受吗？我很乐意倾听并提供帮助。

references.title: Translate the word "accuracy" to Chinese.?
references.contents:
Translate the word "accuracy" to Chinese.?
准确性 (zhǔnquè xìng).

references.title: Tell me a joke
references.contents:
Tell me a joke
Question:Why did the cow go to the doctor?                                                                                                       Answer:To get its moo-dicinal needs taken care of!\n\n

references.title: Rewrite the following sentence to reflect a casual writing style:\n"I implore you to read this important document."?
references.contents:
Rewrite the following sentence to reflect a casual writing style:\n"I implore you to read this important document."?
I really urge you to take a look at this important document.

references.title: Construct a sentence using the following vocabulary words: culture, galvanize?
references.contents:
Construct a sentence using the following vocabulary words: culture, galvanize?
"The institutes mission is to galvanize a culture of innovation."
